description: Well, here's a bit of a nuisance. Ghost of Tsushima DIRECTOR'S CUT is launching on May 16th and the developers have explained how it will work on Steam Deck but it's a mixture of good and bad news.
title: Ghost of Tsushima single-player only on Steam Deck due to PlayStation Network features

description: Give thanks to Yoba, farming fans, for The Official Stardew Valley Cookbook has now launched! Make yourself some game-inspired tasty treats.
title: The Official Stardew Valley Cookbook is out now

description: Another quality bundle is live on Fanatical with the Trinity Bundle - Immortal Edition, giving you a chance to grab multiple really good games for a ridiculous price.
title: Fanatical's Trinity Bundle - Immortal Edition has Prey, Fallout 3 & Vegas, Mortal Shell and more

description: Okay, I'm gonna go ahead and need Iron Gate to make a Valheim anime now. The Valheim: Ashlands update has landed and the trailer is simply awesome.
title: Valheim: Ashlands is out now with a supremely cool animated trailer

description: Manjaro 24.0, based on Arch Linux, has been released pulling in a whole lot of upgrades across every part of the system.
title: Manjaro 24.0 released with KDE Plasma 6, GNOME 46, Linux kernel 6.9

description: Ready for more strategy games with a blending of RPG mechanics? Broken Alliance from the Death and Taxes dev gives strong Heroes of Might and Magic vibes.
title: Broken Alliance from the Death and Taxes dev gives strong Heroes of Might and Magic vibes

description: Here's an upcoming sanbox horror game that has an amusing idea. You've been cloned! And you need to take out your clone before you're killed.
title: Kill your clone before they find you in DoubleWe

description: While we have Wine and Proton nowadays, they're not always the best solution and one developer decided to get RPG Maker MV/MZ games on Linux.
title: This open source project runs RPG Maker MV/MZ games on Linux

description: Recently the Aleph One team released the classic Bungie shooter Marathon on Steam, as I covered previously, but it's only officially for macOS and Windows despite it supporting Linux. Now you can use Luxtorpeda for it.
title: Luxtorpeda adds Classic Marathon for playing the Native Linux version via Steam

description: Well, Nintendo aren't going to be happy about this one are they. A developer going by Mr-Wiseguy released an open source tool for bringing Nintendo 64 titles to any platform, and released a PC port of Zelda: Majora's Mask.
title: Zelda: Majora's Mask gets a PC port with a new open source tool for Nintendo 64 games
